home.slogan: We create websites in Israel and abroad

about.title: ABOUT US
about.text_1: We are a team of professionals with extensive experience.
about.text_2: Our work is based on partnership and the value of each participant in the process.
about.text_3: We are building an open and trusting system of cooperation, where every team member is important and every client is a partner. We believe that digital solutions should be accessible, effective and reflect the uniqueness of each business.
about.text_4: Our approach is not a stream development, but an individual path to success for each client. We believe that each project is unique, and our task is to make it simple, convenient and effective, making the Internet space more convenient.

program.title: Stages of working with us
program.text_1: We contact you in a way convenient for you (by phone, by mail or in person). We get acquainted, discuss the conditions, tasks and your vision. Then we choose a suitable service package for you, outline the scope of work, discuss the cost.
program.text_2: We sign a contract. You pay an advance payment of 30% of the cost and we start working on your project. You will be able to see the first results in 5 days. We prefer to always be in close contact with the customer so that you have the opportunity to influence the result and make decisions at all stages of production.
program.text_3: We sign the work acceptance certificate and help publish (if necessary) the website on the Internet on the hosting service you have chosen.

successStories.storyText: Developed a personal portfolio website for a photographer in Israel with a focus on visual content.
successStories.review: Hexobee created a clean, stylish, and user-friendly website for me — and it really works! I started getting more inquiries through the form, and the site is super easy to navigate. Thank you for the fast and attentive work — everything was clear and professional!

successStories.storyText: Created a responsive website for a cleaning company in St. Petersburg optimized for mobile devices.
successStories.review: Thank you, Hexobee, for a beautiful and professional website! The team truly captured my style and made a site that reflects me perfectly. Everything was fast, clear, and on point. A pleasure to work with and to show to clients!

survey.title: SURVEY FOR THE DEVELOPMENT OF A ONE-PAGE SITE
survey.text_1: Please fill out the form so we can create a website that meets your expectations.
survey.select_more_options: Please select one or more options

question_1.1.question: What is the main purpose of the site?
question_1.1.answer_1.11: Launching a new product or service

question_1.3.question: What is the motivation for people to visit this site?
question_1.3.placeholder: How will the site solve their problems?

question_1.4.question: What makes your business unique?
question_1.4.placeholder: Describe the unique features of your business

question_1.5.question: How do you rate the success of a site visit?
question_1.5.description: Please select one or more options that you think best reflect the effectiveness of your site:
question_1.5.answer_4: Conversion (the ratio of visitors to target actions)

question_1.6.question: What key actions should a user take on a website?
question_1.6.answer_5: Share on social networks using buttons.

question_6.2.question: What mistakes do your competitors make that you want to avoid?
